text: Tim Smyczek was the defending champion, but he lost to Sam Groth in the semifinals. Adrian Mannarino won the tournament, defeating Sam Groth 3–6, 7–6(8–6). 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Knoxville Challenger Category:Knoxville Challenger
title: 2014 Knoxville Challenger – Singles
